fullDescription.intro: Displays a local BAM file using the Picard API. Not, this node still needs to be refreshed after each KNIME session. The first table contains the VCF results. The second table contains the sample name and the path to a BAM file.
fullDescription.option: The VCF POS column. The genomic position (1-based)
